```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read in some data

Read in the litters dataset.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv") #relative path
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df) #changing the variable name in the dataset
```
